customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed. The first time I used these was on ...
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed. The first time I used these was on a 3 hour domestic flight. When I removed them from my luggage they were mishappen (from the pressure on the plane I guess ). One was so bad that when I flipped the top open the whole lid case off and the bottle Had expanded to a point where the neck of the bottle will no longer fit into the base of the lid. The item cannot be reused, which means I lost the bottle and all of the product inside. The second bottle was also mishappen and had expanded but not as bad. See photos.

customer_reviews.title: Caution when using for air travel!

customer_reviews.title: Cyclopentasiloxane!!! Your tube is not defective!
customer_reviews.text: FYI travel peeps!! Cyclopentasiloxane is a silicone-based cyclic compound found in many hair serums. That’s right, silicone product in a silicone container equals chemical reaction that will misshapen your container because Science!! Turns out the FAQ of silicone travel containers like GoToobs has a disclaimer on their website. On the list of non-recommended items to put in the tubes, they list hair serums specifically, shampoos and conditioners designed to add shine or luster to hair as well as products with Argan Oil. Happy travels and maybe buy just the serums in a little travel size.
customer_reviews.author: sunny side up
